name: Morbid Land
description:
DESCRIPTION IN ENGLISH AND PORTUGUESE

RELEASE MORBID LAND 1.3.0 - FREE INDIE GAME !

New version, now completely FREE of this game single-player 3D action RPG with the old school style of the genre, retro graphics and a lot of action. Create your hero and follow your destiny through the evolution of your attributes, abilities, spells and weapons. 

Embark on this epic adventure and bring peace again to Arhaaty !

Nova versão completa e GRATUITA deste RPG de ação 3D, single-player, com o estilo da velha escola do gênero, gráficos retrô e muita ação. Crie seu herói e faça seu destino através da evolução de seus atributos, habilidades, magias e armas.

Embarque nesta aventura épica e traga a paz de novo para Arhaaty!

CHANGELOG 1.3.0

  • Lots of bug fixes. 
  • Great gain in perfomance in the game.(Much faster and smoother game engine)
  • More effective memory management.
  • Increased running speed.
  • Improvements in base textures that make up your avatar.
  • Now the resistance soldiers do not try to shove the player. :D
  • Small, but significant change in the creation screen of the character.
  • Improvement in the system of particles (Blood, explosions and others ...)
  • Climatic and environmental effects at various levels, improving their atmosphere.
  • Internal time control of engine has been improved and is now much more assertive.
  • Time life of spells were regulated more effectively and the effects of some spells were also improved.
  • Introductory video that can be accessed in the profile.
  • Extra content added in profile.
  • Some audios have been improved.
  • Two new songs.
  • Image of Game Over has been improved.
  • A brief change in interface to switch between masteries.
  • Fixed synchronization errors in the soldiers animations of the resistance and improvement in the arena soldier's behavior.
  • Speed of attack with heavy weapons increased a little (Now it does not look like an old man trying to lift a rock.)
  • Time of the balls of light increased.
  • Critical damage formula redone.
  • Animations of npcs (mission) running at the correct time. 
  • Fixed the bug where some attributes of the items were displayed in the wrong way. 
  • Corrected the error of the Message of rewards of the missions.
  • Small modification in the way it shows the quantity of the items in the inventory. 
  • Compatibility with windows 10.
  • Motor updated with Irrlicht 1.8.4
  • Now the game is completely FREE. :D
